meta.tagline: Trusted Floor, Rice, and Chilli Processing Services

hero.title: Shree Durga Traders
hero.subtitle: Reliable milling support for farmers, traders, and local families.
hero.description: We provide quality floor milling, rice milling, chilli grinding, and related grain processing under one roof.

about.title: About Us
about.description: Shree Durga Traders serves the local farming and trading community with dependable grain processing. Our team focuses on clean handling, consistent grinding, and timely service for every customer.

items.name: Floor Mill
items.description: Fine flour grinding for wheat and other grains with consistent texture.

items.name: Rice Mill
items.description: Efficient rice cleaning and milling for households and traders.

items.name: Chilli Grinding Machine
items.description: Hygienic chilli grinding with controlled fineness and color quality.

items.name: Other Grain Processing
items.description: Custom processing support for multiple grains based on customer needs.
